index.NAME: Hi! I'm Claudia Bonilla
index.PRESENTATION: I create visual experiences that tell stories. Curious, creative, and fearless in facing digital challenges.

skills.TITLE: Skills and Software
skills.1: Layout design for catalogs, magazines, and editorial materials with clean and professional structures.
skills.2: Design of logos, visual identities, and vector graphics adapted to different formats.
skills.3: Photo retouching, photomontage, and creation of graphic pieces for digital campaigns and social media.
skills.4: Color correction and photo editing to maintain visual consistency across projects.
skills.5: Preparation and review of PDF files ready for print or digital distribution.
skills.6: Digital illustration and creative sketches for branding or social media projects.
skills.7: Animation of graphics, text, and visual elements for videos and motion graphics.
skills.8: Video editing, audio synchronization, and narrative assembly.
skills.9: Color grading and professional finishing for video projects.
skills.10: Interface design, interactive prototyping, and creation of consistent visual systems.
skills.11: 3D modeling to integrate into visual or web projects.
skills.12: Development of modular and scalable interfaces using modern front-end architecture.
skills.13: Responsive web layout and adaptation of designs into clean, semantic code.
skills.14: Implementation of interactivity, animations, and dynamic behavior on websites.
skills.15: Object-oriented programming and development of logical components for web projects.
skills.16: Backend functionality development and database integration.
skills.17: Design and management of databases for websites or web applications.
skills.18: Version control and collaboration on development projects.
skills.19: Creation and customization of self-managed websites based on custom designs.
skills.20: Design of visual presentations and support materials for projects or clients.
skills.21: Writing and formatting of documents, budgets, or brand manuals.

desc.1: Do you have a project in mind or would you like to collaborate on something creative?
desc.2: I love working on new ideas that combine design and technology.
desc.3: If you think I can help you or just want to say hello,
desc.4: feel free to write to me!
